content: updated 1/23/2023 scrub it scrubby by pam stiff materials yarn bee scrub-ology scrub it us j hook 6mm pool noodle pieces optional abbreviations chain = chain half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet increase = increase by working 2 half_double_crochet in same back loop hdc2tog = half double two together decrease notes cid 120 project is worked a continuous spiral so use a marker for beginning of round i use a length of yarn that you flip back and forth over the first stitch of every round cid 120 work in back loops only with a half_double_crochet you can also go through the bar in back of the stitch so it is two loops cid 120 you are working standard increases and decreases of 8 stitches each round pattern ch4 and join in a ring round 1 work 8 half_double_crochet in the ring being careful to work over the tail of the yarn round 2 2 half_double_crochet in back loop of each stitch around 16 st half_double_crochet increase in each stitch round 3 *half_double_crochet increase in bl half_double_crochet in next bl* repeat * * around 24 st cid 120 flip to wrong side and pull yarn tail to tighten up circle thread tail in needle and work this end so it does not come back open go back to right side and continue round 4 *half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet half_double_crochet* repeat * * around 32 st round 5 & 6 half_double_crochet around remember in back loops round 7 *hdc2tog half_double_crochet half_double_crochet* repeat * * around 24 st round 8 *hdc2tog half_double_crochet* repeat * * around 16 st optional cut sliver off pool noodle and insert in work round 9 hdc2tog around 8 sts cut about a 6 inch tail and cinch up center and fasten_off with tapestry needle
